subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Dwight Howard had 32 points and 17 rebounds, and the host Orlando Magic withstood a career-high 50 points by Dwyane Wade to rout the Miami Heat, 122-99.
snippet: Dwight Howard had 32 points and 17 rebounds, and the host Orlando Magic withstood a career-high 50 points by Dwyane Wade to rout the Miami Heat, 122-99.
